azureDevOps._comment: Azure DevOps integration settings. Required for /speckit.startIssue command.

_instructions.organization: Your Azure DevOps organization name (from URL: https://dev.azure.com/{organization}/)
_instructions.authentication: Set AZURE_DEVOPS_PAT environment variable or use 'az login'

branchNaming._comment: When true, branches are named {work-item-id}-{title}. When false, uses auto-increment numbers.

features._comment: Automatically archive work item data after creating spec to prevent reuse
